original_title: A tree falls in Kandy damaging 8 vehicles.
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Two people have been injured after a large Bo tree fell on Asgiriya Tilak Ratnayake Mawatha in Kandy.
The police said that 8 vehicles were severly damaged on the road.
The Bo tree has fallen this afternoon, and the road has now been opened for vehicular movement.
The chieftain or the main ‘kapu mahatha’ of the Kataragama Maha Devalaya, arrested by the Colombo Crimes Division.
Kudu Roshan and others were arrested by the ‘Yukthiya’ operation
